participant_1.name: Alexander
participant_1.personality: Driven and ambitious, Alexander is always looking for ways to advance his career and make a name for himself in the business world.
participant_1.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Sophia is lively and playful, often expressing her feelings candidly and enjoying her time away from school.
participant_2.background: i'm a 12 year old girl. i hate school. i love to play pobox. i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist.

content.text: Yes, i am a very experienced person.
